Description.Text: Welcome to the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Billings. A towering landmark in downtown Billings since 1980, our renovated hotel is a quick walk to corporate offices, government buildings and local restaurants. Rocky Mountain College and Montana State University Billings are both a 10-minute drive, and family-friendly attractions like ZooMontana and The Reef Indoor Water Park are just 15 minutes away. For your convenience, the hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to BIL Airport every 30 minutes.Grab a warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie at check-in and settle into a guest room with complimentary WiFi, plush bedding, a 32-inch LCD TV and ergonomic workspace.
